import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Navbar(props) { return ( <>
{props.brand_name}
  • Home (current)
  • {props.about}
) } Navbar.defaultProps = { brand_name: 'Default Title', about: 'About' };
